wordpressPost.title: Hobby
wordpressPost.content:
Some people choose the oddest things as their hobbies. Just look at these crazy gymnasts, they have four hours of practice a day, five days a week, and whereas most of us would call such strenous excercise hard, difficult, backbraking work, these nutters call it a rather pleasurable hobby, and they do it all out of pure love for… well for whatever they love about it.

Here's to crazy nutters doing silly things all their lives *raises chalice*
